publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5651 Bill Butler: David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion—That the Parliament congratulates David Savage Jnr on becoming the first ever Scottish super-bantamweight boxing champion; recognises that he is a product of the Argo Boxing Club, based in Drumchapel, which has served the local community since 1974; acknowledges that he follows in the footsteps of his father, David Savage Snr, who was also a Scottish professional boxing champion, and wishes David Savage Jnr continued success in his professional career. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Bob Doris*, Jackson Carlaw*, Des McNulty*, Jim Tolson*, John Park*

S3M-5651 David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion (lodged on 1 February 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Pauline McNeill*, James Kelly*, Patricia Ferguson*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-5651 David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion (lodged on 1 February 2010) Elaine Smith*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-5651 David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion (lodged on 1 February 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-5651 Bill Butler: David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion—That the Parliament congratulates David Savage Jnr on becoming the first ever Scottish super-bantamweight boxing champion; recognises that he is a product of the Argo Boxing Club, based in Drumchapel, which has served the local community since 1974; acknowledges that he follows in the footsteps of his father, David Savage Snr, who was also a Scottish professional boxing champion, and wishes David Savage Jnr continued success in his professional career. Supported by: Robin Harper, Aileen Campbell, Bob Doris, Jackson Carlaw, Des McNulty, Jim Tolson, John Park, Stuart McMillan, Pauline McNeill, James Kelly, Patricia Ferguson, Mary Mulligan, Bill Kidd, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Aitken, Elaine Smith, Jamie Hepburn, Ken Macintosh, Hugh Henry, Michael Matheson*
S3M-5651 David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion (lodged on 1 February 2010) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-5651 David Savage Jnr, Scottish Boxing Champion (lodged on 1 February 2010) Karen Whitefield*
